ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Organiser_Address__c == "." || Organiser_Address__c == "TBC" || Organiser_Address__c == "TBD" || Organiser_Address__c == "tbc" || Organiser_Address__c == "tbd" || Organiser_Address__c == "Already Set Up" || Organiser_Address__c == "already set up" || Organiser_Address__c == "unknown" || Organiser_Address__c == "Unknown"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the Organiser Address. Data quality is important
